line_1: He on the Bench in quiet sits,
line_2: Deciding, as They bring the Writs.

line_1: The Man within the Coach that sits,
And There in Public Grandeur sits,
line_2: Into the Head at length She gets,

line_1: And There in Public Grandeur sits,
line_2: To judge of Things, and censure Wits.

line_1: As, twing'd with pain, he pensive sits,
line_2: And raves, and prays, and swears by fits,

line_1: She bares her bosom to the wind, and sits,
line_2: And sobbing struggles with the rising fits:

line_1: Where Genius in familiar converse sits,
line_2: Crowns real worth, and blasts pretending Wits;

line_1: In Odin's hall with him she sits.
line_2: With Oscar now in air she flits:

line_1: So at Llewellins your great Brother sits,
line_2: The laughter of his tributary wits;

line_1: Upon a beam aloft he sits,
line_2: And nods, and seems to think, by fits.

line_1: While with discordant notes the screech Owl sits,
line_2: The nightly Bat amid the ruins flits,

line_1: Inshrin'd on high the sacred Virgil sits,
line_2: In Fame's fair Temple, o'er the boldest Wits

line_1: The Fisher undisturb'd at leisure sits;
line_2: While he defends our Isle from hostile Fleets,

line_1: There ev'ry Charm in lofty Triumph sits,
line_2: Scorns poor Defect, and to no Fault submits;

line_1: To mix the Colours, when an Angel sits.
line_2: An Angel's Hand alone the Pencil fits,

line_1: There the dear Man my Saviour sits,
Box'd in a Chair the Beau impatient sits,
line_2: While Spouts run clatt'ring o'er the Roof by Fits;
